Tap the calendar icon on the home screen to open the calendar application.
Open the Simple Calendar Pro app, displaying the current month, April. Then, navigate to the previous month, March, by tapping the left arrow button.
Click the "Search" icon to open the search bar.
Click "19" to select March 19th.
Click the back arrow to return to the previous screen.
Navigate back to the calendar view.
Click the right arrow to navigate to the next month, displaying the calendar for April.
